name: Recipe: Delights of Wondrous Wanderings
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Delights of Wondrous Wanderings.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Recipe</color>
Restores <color=#37ffff>30–34%</color> of Max HP and an additional <color=#37ffff>600–1,900</color> HP to the selected character.
<color=#ffffff>Proficiency</color>
15
<color=#ffffff>Related Dishes</color>

customize.name: Delights of Wondrous Wanderings
customize.desc: A dessert box based on the recipes of several different companions, simply overflowing with heartfelt intentions. Neatly arranged rows of delicate pastries line the box — but what will this goodwill gesture taste like?

customize.name: Delicious Delights of Wondrous Wanderings
customize.desc: A dessert box based on the recipes of several different companions, simply overflowing with heartfelt intentions. The artisanry here is akin to the exquisite scene of the moon cutting through the clouds. Indeed, you can barely bear to eat such a precious gift.

customize.name: Suspicious Delights of Wondrous Wanderings
customize.desc: A dessert box based on the recipes of several different companions, simply overflowing with heartfelt intentions. There's nothing wrong with the structure itself, but you smell a strange disharmony in its scents... You are apprehensive about giving it a go. Hmm, could it work as a memento instead?

customize.name: Delights of Wondrous Wanderings
customize.desc: A dessert box based on the recipes of several different companions, simply overflowing with heartfelt intentions. Neatly arranged rows of delicate pastries line the box — but what will this goodwill gesture taste like?

customize.name: Flour
customize.desc: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into, it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner.

customize.name: Bird Egg
customize.desc: An incredibly versatile ingredient that can supply all of your daily protein needs.

customize.name: Butter
customize.desc: An extract from milk. With the appropriate application, it can bring rich aromas to even the most basic ingredients.

customize.name: Jam
customize.desc: A gelatinous substance made from fruit and sugar. Even a little bit can easily wake up tired taste buds.
